title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the TravelConcierge project, including customer service workflows, channels, integrations, personalization features, data models, security considerations, and performance requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integrations with existing systems. Consider factors such as scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Provide a high-level overview as well as detailed component diagrams and data flow diagrams.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for customer service agents, considering usability, accessibility, branding guidelines, and integration with backend systems.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design the data storage and management strategy, including customer data, service logs, personalization profiles, and data security and privacy considerations.

title: Define Security and Compliance Requirements
description: Identify and document security and compliance requirements, such as data privacy, access controls, industry regulations (e.g., PCI-DSS, GDPR), and any specific requirements for the travel and hospitality industry.

title: Plan for Deployment and Operations
description: Define the deployment strategy, infrastructure requirements, monitoring, and maintenance processes for the TravelConcierge application.

title: Review and Approve System Design
description: Review and approve the system design, including architecture, user interface, data management, security, and deployment plans.
